channel.title: Articles on Project EXT
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Project EXT

item.title: Are you looking for a graphics card on a low budget?
item.description: Mar 31, 2022 Before even reading this, let me answer your question you may be asking. The graphics card you should purchase is the one you can afford. If you can’t afford the one you’re looking into and it’s a necessity to get a video card now, find one you can afford and settle with that for as long as possible. If it’s not neccesary to grab that one in specific and you’re looking for something more powerful, don’t get anything until you can afford it.

item.title: Is It Worth Using the Oculus Quest 2 over AirLink?
item.description: Jan 21, 2022 The other day, I was watching a Spawncast Live-stream late at night and one of the conversations were asking how the Oculus Quest 2 & PC would compare to the upcoming PSVR 2 and a PS5. The overall opinion was PSVR would be better because connecting to PC was either difficult or expensive, but that isn’t exactly true. For this video, I want to show you guys how to use an Oculus quest 2 wireless with Air Link and how it performs with games mentioned like Half Life: Alyx.
